00029 import os
00030 import tempfile
00031 
00032 from Koo.Fields.AbstractFieldWidget import *
00033 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00034 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00035 from PyQt4.uic import *
00036 
00037 from Koo.Common import Common
00038 from Koo.Common import Semantic
00039 from Koo.Common import Numeric
00040 
00041 (BinaryFieldWidgetUi, BinaryFieldWidgetBase) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('binary.ui') ) 
00042 
00043 class BinaryFieldWidget(AbstractFieldWidget, BinaryFieldWidgetUi):
00044         def __init__(self, parent, model, attrs={}):
00045                 AbstractFieldWidget.__init__(self, parent, model, attrs)
00046                 BinaryFieldWidgetUi.__init__(self)
00047                 self.setupUi(self)
00048 
00049                 self.filters = attrs.get('filters', '*')
00050                 if isinstance( self.filters, basestring ):
00051                         self.filters = self.filters.split(',')
00052                 self.filters = _('Files (%s)') % ' '.join( self.filters )
00053 
00054                 self.fileNameField = attrs.get('filename')
00055                 self.baseDirectory = unicode( QDir.homePath() )
00056 
00057                 self.connect( self.pushNew, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.new )
00058                 self.connect( self.pushRemove, SIGNAL('clicked()'),self.remove )
00059 
00060                 self.actionSave = QAction(self)
00061                 self.actionSave.setText( _('&Save') )
00062                 self.actionSave.setIcon( QIcon( ':/images/save.png' ) )
00063                 self.actionOpen = QAction(self)
00064                 self.actionOpen.setText( _('&Open') )
00065                 self.actionOpen.setIcon( QIcon( ':/images/open.png' ) )
00066                 self.actionShowImage = QAction(self)
00067                 self.actionShowImage.setText( _('Show &image'), )
00068                 self.actionShowImage.setIcon( QIcon( ':/images/convert.png' ) )
00069 
00070                 self.menu = QMenu( self )
00071                 self.menu.addAction( self.actionSave )
00072                 self.menu.addAction( self.actionOpen )
00073                 self.menu.addAction( self.actionShowImage )
00074                 self.pushSave.setMenu( self.menu )
00075                 self.pushSave.setDefaultAction( self.actionSave )
00076 
00077                 self.connect( self.actionSave, SIGNAL('triggered()'), self.save )
00078                 self.connect( self.actionOpen, SIGNAL('triggered()'), self.open )
00079                 self.connect( self.actionShowImage, SIGNAL('triggered()'), self.showImage )
00080                 self.connect( self.menu, SIGNAL('aboutToShow()'), self.updateShowImageAction )
00081 
00082                 self.uiBinary.setAcceptDrops( True )
00083                 self.installPopupMenu( self.uiBinary )
00084 
00085                 self.sizeName = '%s.size' % self.name 
00086                 
00087         def eventFilter(self, target, event):
00088                 if not event.type() in (QEvent.Drop, QEvent.DragEnter, QEvent.DragMove):
00089                         return AbstractFieldWidget.eventFilter(self, target, event)
00090                 if not event.mimeData().hasText():
00091                         return AbstractFieldWidget.eventFilter(self, target, event)
00092                 if event.type() in (QEvent.DragMove, QEvent.DragEnter):
00093                         event.accept()
00094                         return True
00095                 path = unicode( event.mimeData().text() ).replace( 'file://', '' )
00096                 self.setBinaryFile( path )
00097                 return True
00098 
00099         def setReadOnly(self, value):
00100                 AbstractFieldWidget.setReadOnly(self, value)
00101                 self.uiBinary.setEnabled( not value )
00102                 self.pushNew.setEnabled( not value )
00103                 self.pushRemove.setEnabled( not value )
00104                 self.updateActions()
00105 
00106         def updateShowImageAction(self):
00107                 pix = QPixmap()
00108                 if self.record and pix.loadFromData( self.record.value(self.name) ):
00109                         self.actionShowImage.setEnabled( True )
00110                 else:
00111                         self.actionShowImage.setEnabled( False )
00112                 
00113         def updateActions(self):
00114                 if self.record and self.record.value(self.sizeName):
00115                         enable = True
00116                 else:
00117                         enable = False
00118                 self.actionSave.setEnabled( enable )
00119                 self.actionOpen.setEnabled( enable )
00120                 self.actionShowImage.setEnabled( enable )
00121 
00122         def menuEntries(self):
00123                 enableApplication = False
00124                 enableImage = False
00125                 if self.record.value(self.name):
00126                         enableApplication = True
00127                         pix = QPixmap()
00128                         if pix.loadFromData( self.record.value(self.name) ):
00129                                 enableImage = True
00130 
00131                 return [ (_('Open...'), self.open, enableApplication), 
00132                          (_('Show &image...'), self.showImage, enableImage) ]
00133 
00134         def open(self):
00135                 if not self.record.value(self.name):
00136                         return
00137 
00138                 # Under windows platforms we need to create the temporary
00139                 # file with an appropiate extension, otherwise the system
00140                 # won't be able to know how to open it. The only way we have
00141                 # to know what kind of file it is, is if the filename property
00142                 # was set, and pick up the extension from that field.
00143                 extension = ''
00144                 if self.fileName():
00145                         extension = '.%s' % self.fileName().rpartition('.')[2]
00146 
00147                 fileName = tempfile.mktemp( extension )
00148                 fp = file(fileName,'wb+')
00149                 fp.write( self.record.value(self.name) )
00150                 fp.close()
00151                 Common.openFile( fileName )
00152 
00153         def showImage(self):
00154                 if not self.record.value(self.name): 
00155                         return
00156                 dialog = QDialog( self )
00157                 dialog.setWindowTitle( _('Image') )
00158                 label = QLabel( dialog )
00159                 pix = QPixmap()
00160                 pix.loadFromData( self.record.value(self.name) )
00161                 label.setPixmap( pix )
00162                 layout = QHBoxLayout( dialog )
00163                 layout.addWidget( label )
00164                 dialog.exec_()
00165 
00166         def new(self):
00167                 filename = QFileDialog.getOpenFileName(self, _('Select the file to attach'), self.baseDirectory, self.filters)
00168                 if filename.isNull():
00169                         return
00170                 filename = unicode(filename)
00171                 self.baseDirectory = os.path.dirname(filename)
00172                 self.setBinaryFile( filename )
00173 
00174         def setBinaryFile(self, filename):
00175                 try:
00176                         value = file(filename, 'rb').read()
00177                 except Exception, e:
00178                         QMessageBox.information(self, _('Error'), _('Error reading the file:\n%s') % unicode(e.args) )
00179                         return
00180 
00181                 self.record.setValue( self.name, value )
00182 
00183                 # The binary widget might have a 'filename' attribute
00184                 # that stores the file name in the field indicated by 'filename'
00185                 if self.fileNameField:
00186                         self.record.setValue( self.fileNameField, os.path.basename(filename) )
00187                         if self.view:
00188                                 self.view.widgets[self.fileNameField].load(self.record)
00189                 self.showValue()
00190 
00191         def fileName(self):
00192                 if self.fileNameField:
00193                         if self.record.fieldExists( self.fileNameField ):
00194                                 return self.record.value( self.fileNameField )
00195                 if self.record.fieldExists( 'name' ):
00196                         return self.record.value( 'name' ) or self.name
00197                 return self.name
00198 
00199         def save(self):
00200                 directory = '%s/%s' % (self.baseDirectory, unicode(self.fileName()) )
00201                 filename = QFileDialog.getSaveFileName( self, _('Save as...'), directory, self.filters )
00202                 if filename.isNull():
00203                         return
00204                 filename = unicode(filename)
00205                 self.baseDirectory = os.path.dirname(filename)
00206 
00207                 try:
00208                         fp = file(filename,'wb+')
00209                         fp.write( self.record.value(self.name) )
00210                         fp.close()
00211                 except Exception, e:
00212                         QMessageBox.information(self, _('Error'), _('Error writing the file:\n%s') % unicode(e.args) )
00213                         return
00214                 Semantic.addInformationToFile( filename, self.record.group.resource, self.record.id, self.name )
00215 
00216         def remove(self):
00217                 self.record.setValue( self.name, False )
00218                 self.clear()
00219                 self.modified()
00220                 if 'filename' in self.attrs:
00221                         w = self.attrs['filename']
00222                         self.record.setValue( w, False )
00223                         if self.view:
00224                                 self.view.widgets[w].load(self.record)
00225 
00226         def showValue(self):
00227                 if self.record.value( self.sizeName ):
00228                         self.setText( self.record.value( self.sizeName ) )
00229                 else:
00230                         self.clear()
00231                 self.updateActions()
00232 
00233         def clear(self):
00234                 self.uiBinary.clear()
00235                 self.updateActions()
00236 
00237         def setText(self, text):
00238                 if text:
00239                         self.uiBinary.setText( text )
00240                 else:
00241                         self.uiBinary.clear()
00242                 self.uiBinary.setCursorPosition( 0 )
00243 
00244         # This widget is a bit special. We don't set the value
00245         # here. We do it in the new(), so we don't have two copies
00246         # of the file (which can be pretty big) in memory.
00247         def store(self):
00248                 pass
00249 
00250         def colorWidget(self):
00251                 return self.uiBinary
00252 
00253         def saveState(self):
00254                 return QByteArray( self.baseDirectory.encode('utf-8') )
00255 
00256         def restoreState(self, value):
00257                 if not value:
00258                         return
00259                 self.baseDirectory = unicode( str( value ), 'utf-8' )
